formattedAddress: 372 Bleecker St, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 372 Bleecker St, New York, NY 10014, USA

originalText.text: After reading the last piercing review I was a little unsure of getting my piercing, nonetheless I still came in because of the cute jewelry and had been set on getting my rook for a while! Sherah did an AMAZING job! Super quick and honestly not painful for me at all, she was so sweet and made sure I was comfortable the entire time. Already looking forward to my next piercing with Astrid and Miyu! :)

originalText.text:
Got my first ear piercing done here and I couldn’t be happier. They locked me through the different areas that were able to be pierced on the ear and guided me in my selection of piercing.

Everything was done in a very hygienic and kind and caring manner and if you have the opportunity to work with Jess. She is wonderful and truly a professional at her craft.

text.text:

originalText.text: Such a great find in west village! All the employees are so friendly and engaging, I felt welcomed from the moment I walked in the door. I’ve been thinking of getting a piercing for a while and Nora helped me choose a piercing piece to add a third lobe piercing on one ear. I went with one of the solid gold choices and LOVE how cute their piercing jewelry options are! The process was relatively quick and I the actual experience getting the piercing was on the same level of sanitation as you’d expect in a doctor’s office or piercing parlor. All around great experience! I’ll come back again

originalText.text:
I would not come back to this piercing studio if it was the last one in the city. I got my rook pierced and although the piercer was very nice, she had to restick the needle in at least 5 times, prod, and use pliers because the earring wouldn’t go in, as I was in the chair for 5-7 minutes profusely bleeding. I’ve gotten my helix, flat, and conch pierced at other studios and did not experience remotely the same level of pain.

I understand some bleeding is expected with this part of the ear but it was pooling in my ear, and my friend who came to the appointment got her rook pierced at Astrid & Miyu in London and said she had 1/10th of the bleeding. She said my ear would continuously refill with blood.

After contacting the store, all they said was the experience varies for everyone and they could offer me 10% off for next time as if I would even consider coming back. You would be better off getting pierced literally anywhere else

originalText.text:
I found Astrid & Miyu while searching online for a reputable piercing studio that was safe, sterile, pierces with a needle (not an earring gun) and also offers pretty jewelry. They have so many options here! I knew it would be several months before I'd be able to switch the earrings in my new double helix piercing, and wanted something I'd love while waiting for the piercings to heal.

All of the staff were friendly and welcoming when I arrived for my appointment. My piercer was Jess and she did a fantastic job. Jess checked in with me through each step of the piercing process and answered all of my questions. The two piercings were precise but fast and the discomfort from the needle was minimal both times. Two hours later, my ear doesn't hurt a bit.

I'll definitely visit Astrid & Miyu again and already have my next 3 ear piercings planned.
